Class ComodideConfiguration

com.comodide.ComodideConfiguration
public class ComodideConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
Configuration for the CoModIDE plugin.
Author:
Karl Hammar

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  ComodideConfiguration.EdgeCreationAxiom
    Enumeration of the different types of ontology axioms that the user might want to create when drawing a new edge between two nodes in the schema diagram.

    • getSelectedEdgeCreationAxioms

      public static java.util.Set<ComodideConfiguration.EdgeCreationAxiom> getSelectedEdgeCreationAxioms()
      A list of axioms that the user may want to create in the target ontology when drawing a new edge between two nodes in the schema diagram.

    • addSelectedEdgeCreationAxiom

    • removeSelectedEdgeCreationAxiom

      public static void removeSelectedEdgeCreationAxiom​(ComodideConfiguration.EdgeCreationAxiom eca)

    • getDeletePropertyDeclarations

      public static java.lang.Boolean getDeletePropertyDeclarations()
      Whether to delete the property declaration when an edge is deleted from the schema diagram. If false, only domains and ranges (rdfs or scoped) will be deleted but the property itself kept in the ontology.

    • setDeletePropertyDeclarations

      public static void setDeletePropertyDeclarations​(java.lang.Boolean value)

    • getUseTargetNamespace

      public static java.lang.Boolean getUseTargetNamespace()
      Whether to use the target ontology namespace when copying pattern entities. If this is false, the pattern entities will retain their original IRIs from the pattern namespace even after being cloned into the target ontology.

    • setUseTargetNamespace

      public static void setUseTargetNamespace​(java.lang.Boolean value)

    • getModuleMetadataExternal

      public static java.lang.Boolean getModuleMetadataExternal()
      Whether to keep modularisation annotations external to the target ontology or not. The pattern selector will provide two OWLOntology objects, one holding the constructs of the instantiated pattern itself, and one holding the annotations about this instantiation as an OPLa module. This preference indicates whether the user wants both of these two to be merged into the target ontology, or whether the annotations should be kept separate.

    • setModuleMetadataExternal

      public static void setModuleMetadataExternal​(java.lang.Boolean value)

    • getSendTelemetry

      public static java.lang.Boolean getSendTelemetry()
      Whether to send usage telemetry.

    • setSendTelemetry

      public static void setSendTelemetry​(java.lang.Boolean value)

    • getTelemetryPreferenceChecked

      public static java.lang.Boolean getTelemetryPreferenceChecked()
      Whether the user has been queried for telemetry sending

    • setTelemetryPreferenceChecked

      public static void setTelemetryPreferenceChecked​(java.lang.Boolean value)
